content.prompt: According to lines 9-10 (<u>Quis</u> . . . <u>tacendis</u>), who is valued and why?

choices.label: A knowledgeable person, because he could reveal things best kept hidden
A conscientious person, because he is always reliable
A quiet person, because he conceals his emotions
A passionate person, because he could encourage other people

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
